pkgmetadata.longdescription: L2 Inference for Change Points in High-Dimensional Time Series // Provides a method for detecting multiple change points in high- dimensional time series, targeting dense or spatially clustered signals. See Li et al. (2023) "L2 Inference for Change Points in High-Dimensional Time Series via a Two-Way MOSUM". arXiv preprint arXiv:2208.13074.
